branchCategory.name: CA2-Z, Double Acting Single Rod, Environmental Option
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CA2 with environmental options are double acting, single rod version of the light weight tie rod air cylinders made for those tough applications.  The CA2 can be ordered with rod end or rear pivot brackets.  The CA2 is available in 40, 50, 63, 80 and 100 bore sizes, and is RoHS compliant.</p>

breadCrumb.name: CA2-Z, Double Acting Single Rod, Environmental Option
